publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3588 Kenneth Gibson: Swimathon 2009—That the Parliament encourages active participation in Swimathon 2009, the world’s biggest swimming fundraising event, organised by Marie Curie Cancer Care; notes that this event will take place from 16 to 19 April 2009 at over 500 pools across the United Kingdom; recognises that over the last two years 30,000 swimmers took part, raising over £3 million, 70% of which went to help fund the work of more than 2,000 Marie Curie nurses who provide care for terminally ill people, the remainder going to the Swimathon Foundation to promote the health benefits of and increased participation in swimming for people of all ages, and acknowledges that further information can be found at www.swimathon.org. Supported by: Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*, Mary Scanlon*, Jamie McGrigor*, James Kelly*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, John Scott*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Alasdair Allan*, Karen Whitefield*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) Hugh Henry*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3588 Kenneth Gibson: Swimathon 2009—That the Parliament encourages active participation in Swimathon 2009, the world’s biggest swimming fundraising event, organised by Marie Curie Cancer Care; notes that this event will take place from 16 to 19 April 2009 at over 500 pools across the United Kingdom; recognises that over the last two years 30,000 swimmers took part, raising over £3 million, 70% of which went to help fund the work of more than 2,000 Marie Curie nurses who provide care for terminally ill people, the remainder going to the Swimathon Foundation to promote the health benefits of and increased participation in swimming for people of all ages, and acknowledges that further information can be found at www.swimathon.org. Supported by: Sandra White, Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Anne McLaughlin, Mary Scanlon, Jamie McGrigor, James Kelly, Rob Gibson, Stuart McMillan, John Scott, Nanette Milne, Bill Kidd, Hugh O’Donnell, Ken Macintosh, Alasdair Allan, Karen Whitefield, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Hugh Henry, Gil Paterson, Jack McConnell*, Michael Matheson*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) Johann Lamont*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-3588 Swimathon 2009 (lodged on 3 March 2009) John Park*, Aileen Campbell*, Robin Harper*
